attributes.action: reconsider the decision to ban the red arrows from the 2012 olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that this action would/could ensite a great deal of resentment toward the government regarding the British heritage. The Red Arrows have for many years entertained the British (All races) with there flying skills.This is PC gone mad.Why are the government trying to make the British people feel shame in being British. Wake up Prime Minister please allow us some small amount of pride in what is left of out country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
